screens.analogy: Think of a function like a recipe. You write the recipe once with placeholders for ingredients (parameters), and then you can use it many times with different ingredients. Each time you follow the recipe, you get a result!
screens.tip: Functions let you reuse code! Write it once, use it many times with different inputs.
